user_query: I want to count the occurrences of the terms 'praise' and 'worship' in the book of Psalms and get the chapter and verse references.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the full text of the book of Psalms.
Count the occurrences of the term 'praise' and note the chapter and verse references.
Count the occurrences of the term 'worship' and note the chapter and verse references.
